goal.ch:
1. 讓學生接觸企業金融中重要且及時的話題。

2. 培養學生識別公司財務問題的能力，並瞭解如何在處理問題時應用金融理論。

3. 激發學生對公司金融研究的興趣。
goal.en:
1.Expose students to important and timely topics in corporate finance.
2.Develop students’ ability to identify problems in corporate finance and understand how to apply finance theories in dealing with the problems.
3.Stimulate students‘ interests in corporate finance research.

outline.ch:
• 首次公開募股：所有的首次公開募股都去哪兒了？
• 公司治理與控制
• 國際公司治理和股東利益保護
• 金融槓桿：產品市場和資本市場的相互作用
• 內部資源的分配和分配錯誤
• 創新與金融
outline.en:
•IPOs: Where have all the IPOs gone?
•Corporate Governance and Control
•International Corporate Governance and Protection of Shareholders’ Interests
•Financial Leverage: Interactions of Product Market and Capital Market
•Allocation and Misallocation of Internal Resources
•Innovation and Finance
